mapper.insert: insert into fav(favid , usersid , goodsid , addtime ) values(#{favid} , #{usersid} , #{goodsid} , #{addtime} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.goodsname, b.status, b.image , b.price from fav a , goods b where a.goodsid = b.goodsid order by favid desc
